attributes.title: Scarring
attributes.review: When I opened this app it showed me many disturbing photos and many disturbing words so steer clear of this app it is very dangerous. It also has malware on it so do not download

this app is not JENIUS at all. if anything, it only produces FAKE NEWS. thanks to this horrible app, my turtle cracked its head open, my dad never came back with any milk, and my toenails are growing the wrong way 😱😱😱 TAKE THIS APP DOWN NOW!!!!!

attributes.title: 0 stars.
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible. It took about 3-4 days to download, then asked me awful questions. Some included 1) what’s your bra size? 2) are you a virgin? 3) would you screw a Oompa Loompa? And it only gets worse. It made my phone glitch, I had to go buy a new one with the money I do not have. It caused my dryer to explode and my back porch to catch fire. My water heater fried my dog. It’s honestly crazy. Whatever you do, don’t get this app! It’s not worth it! RUN!! Get this app off the store! Smh.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Um this app is literally the worst app ever like everything is slow you get an add every click you make ! Not to mention the racism I mean soon as I download this app they asked for my race I clicked black and “ NEGRO” popped up on my screen and that was just the end of it don’t download it! If 0 stars was an option that’s what I would of gave this app I just can’t with the disrespect. I don’t recommend this app

attributes.title: Bad!!!!
attributes.review: This app hacked into my phone and sold my debit card info.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app took 360 days to download and it told me to download it again for 69 more days longer HORRIBLE HORRIBLE

attributes.title: Will he pay for therapy 😓👉🏾👈🏾
attributes.review:
I was so petrified....never in my life did I think I’d see a talking breed of a Cheeto and an orange..or maybe even a dollar tree version of the noob on roblox... but it happened, now who’s gonna pay for my therapy. He should because he did it
And to this day I can’t even sleep 🥺😭
